attributes.action: Please save Beech Grove Surgery: enhance and extend Isle of Wight NHS services.
attributes.additional_details:
REFERENCES:
Beech Grove Surgery website: http://www.beechgrovesurgery.nhs.uk/

https://www.countypress.co.uk/news/17949616.drop-in-session-patients-ask-beech-grove-surgery/

GP Surgery Closures: Drop-In Sessions For Affected ...
https://iwradio.co.uk/2019/10/04/gp-surgery-closures-drop-in-sessions-for-affected...
The news comes after Beech Grove Surgery announced it would hand back its contract to the NHS Isle of Wight Clinical Commissioning Group, as previously reported by Isle of Wight Radio.
attributes.background: Please keep Beech Grove Surgery open: it might close when the GPs  leave at the end of March 2020. Please make the Isle of Wight a magnet with a new major university teaching hospital of medical excellence, supported by a network of primary care GPs and other primary care services across the Island.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You might like to contact the NHS Isle of Wight Clinical Commissioning Group instead.
